name: Vegan Carrot Cake Recipe
description: Vegan Carrot Cake Recipe. Vegan Carrot Cake Quick bread loaf with Cashew Cream Frosting. Moist, spiced, full of carrots. Low oil. Soyfree Palmoil-free. Makes 1 9 by 5 loaf.

video.name: Vegan Carrot Cake with Cinnamon Cashew Frosting - VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Vegan Carrot Cake with Cinnamon Cashew Frosting
Full Recipe here ➡️ http://www.veganricha.com/2016/03/vegan-carrot-cake-recipe.html

Vegan Carrot Cake Recipe. Vegan Carrot Cake Quick bread loaf with Cashew Cream Frosting. Moist, spiced with Cinnamon and Cardamom. Soyfree Palmoil-free.

#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes  #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking #carrotcake

recipeIngredient: 2 cups loosely packed grated or shredded carrots
2/3 cup sugar (i use a mix of regular and brown sugar. Add 2 tbsp more for sweeter)
1/2  of a small apple or 1/4 cup chopped apple or use 1/4 cup apple sauce
1/2 cup water or non dairy milk (or use orange juice)
2 cups flour (I use 1 cup whole wheat and 1 cup unbleached white)
1/2 cup cashews soaked for 1 hour or overnight

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your pan for baking by lining with parchment or greasing and dusting with flour. Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F / 180ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare your pan for baking by lining with parchment or greasing and dusting with flour. Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F / 180ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: Grate or shred the carrots and transfer to a bowl. Add the maple, sugar, oil, lemon, vanilla and mix well. Let sit for 2 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Grate or shred the carrots and transfer to a bowl. Add the maple, sugar, oil, lemon, vanilla and mix well. Let sit for 2 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile Blend the flax, apples, chopped carrots, ginger with water until pureed. Add to the carrot bowl and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile Blend the flax, apples, chopped carrots, ginger with water until pureed. Add to the carrot bowl and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, whisk the dry ingredients until well combined. Transfer to the wet and mix until there are no dry flour streaks. Fold in the nuts and currants. The mixture should be a stiff-ish batter. If the batter is too wet/moist (depends on the carrots), add 1 to 2 tbsp more flour and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, whisk the dry ingredients until well combined. Transfer to the wet and mix until there are no dry flour streaks. Fold in the nuts and currants. The mixture should be a stiff-ish batter. If the batter is too wet/moist (depends on the carrots), add 1 to 2 tbsp more flour and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the thick batter into prepared loaf pan. Even it out on the top.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the thick batter into prepared loaf pan. Even it out on the top.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 60 to 70 minutes or until the toothpick from the center comes out almost clean. Cool for 15 mins and remove from the pan. Cool for atleast another 10 minutes before slicing.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 60 to 70 minutes or until the toothpick from the center comes out almost clean. Cool for 15 mins and remove from the pan. Cool for atleast another 10 minutes before slicing.

recipeInstructions.text: Frosting: Blend the soaked cashews with water, salt, lemon, sugar and vanilla. Blend until smooth. (I use a nutri bullet small blender).Taste and adjust lemon, sweet and salt and blend. Add a 1/4 tsp white vinegar for stronger sour flavor. Add some cinnamon for a cinnamony frosting. If the mixture is runny, add 1 tsp coconut flour and blend it. Add more coconut flour if needed to get the desired consistency. Spread the frosting over the cake.
recipeInstructions.name: Frosting: Blend the soaked cashews with water, salt, lemon, sugar and vanilla. Blend until smooth. (I use a nutri bullet small blender).Taste and adjust lemon, sweet and salt and blend. Add a 1/4 tsp white vinegar for stronger sour flavor. Add some cinnamon for a cinnamony frosting. If the mixture is runny, add 1 tsp coconut flour and blend it. Add more coconut flour if needed to get the desired consistency. Spread the frosting over the cake.

keywords: easy vegan carrot cake, eggless carrot cake, vegetarian carrot cake recipe
